briefTitle: Informed Decision Users of the Health System and Participation in Organized Screening for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Informed Decision Users of the Health System and Participation in Organized Screening for Breast Cancer : a Qualitative Analysis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: women's attendance rate for the breast cancer screening program during the 12 months following the invitation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
